original_text: If trouble comes to you six times, he will rescue you. No bad thing will hurt you, as often as it happens. If trouble comes to you six times, he will rescue you.
korean_text: 여섯 가지 환난에서 너를 구원하시며 일곱 가지 환난이라도 그 재앙이 네게 미치지 않게 하시며

sentences.original_text: If trouble comes to you six times,
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 재앙이 여섯 번 당신에게 닥친다면,

sentences.original_text: No bad thing will hurt you,
sentences.korean_translation: 아무 나쁜 것도 당신을 해치지 않을 것이며,

sentences.original_text: If trouble comes to you six times,
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 재앙이 여섯 번 당신에게 닥친다면,
